name: Pirate Ship Sim 3D
description:
Amazing ocean adventures
Pirates’ treasures
Real ship simulator
And the great atmosphere of a real ship battle
In Pirate Ship Sim 3D - Sea Treasures!

• Tap the steering wheel to move your ship and explore the ocean.
• Tap the left or the right canon to aim and to shoot at the enemies’ ships.
• Win the battle or sink with your ship like a real captain.

Pirate Ship Sim 3D - Sea Treasures features:
High quality 3D graphics – feel the atmosphere of real pirate adventures;
Exciting shooter – shoot at the enemies’ ships and survive the battle;
Perfect water driving simulator – explore an infinite ocean.
